text: The Pavillon de l'Arsenal is a museum in Paris, France. The museum is dedicated to architecture and urban planning in Paris and the Parisian metropolis. A museum of fine arts was opened first opened in 1879 on the site of the Pavillon de l'Arsenal. In 1988, it became the first centre for urban planning and architecture in Paris. == Gallery == File:L'invention de la tour européenne.tif|a model of a new skyscrapers in paris File:OEUVRES- CONSTRUITES.jpg|the main hall File:Paris - métropole 2020 (Pavillon de l'Arsenal) (7385407458).jpg|an aerial view of paris == Other websites == * Pavillon de l'Arsenal Category:Architectural organizations Category:Urban planning Category:Museums in Paris
title: Pavillon de l'Arsenal
